BasicInfo.short: Whiskey Media develops topical websites that utilize the Django framework.

Products.name: ComicVine
Products.description: ComicVine is an online comic database that features Comic Reviews, News, Videos, and Forums for the latest in and more.

Products.name: GiantBomb
Products.description: GiantBomb is a video game encyclopedia. It features full articles and images covering video games, characters, concepts and companies.

Products.name: AnimeVice
Products.description: AnimeVice is a structured wiki product about anime offered by Whiskey Media. The site launched in December 2008.
